name: Flying Motorcycle – Real Police Pilot Helicopter
name_original: Flying Motorcycle – Real Police Pilot Helicopter
description:
Flying helicopter transformed Police Bike
Policeman get ready for a bone crushing thunder jet flight on the Bike.
Be the motorbike stunt rider in this epic flying motorcycle simulator. Have a flip flapper flight experience filled with amazingness. On duty policeman get ready for an extreme stunts rider jet flight. Put on your officer motorcycle helmet and gear.
Go Go Go! Shake off your jet blues and smack down the controls to start your engines. Show some extreme action and perform bone crushing stunts in the air. Collect coins on the endless asphalt road between the city, mountains and rocks.
Switch on the nitro power and show some finesse driving with the newest Flying police bike games.
